title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin’s Raiders/Chiefs MNF Instant Reaction
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin’s Raiders/Chiefs MNF Instant Reaction
description:
Colin gives his instant reaction to Chiefs pulling out a divisional MNF win over the Raiders at Arrowhead, and explains how the NFL’s overcorrection to the Tua concussion controversy is resulting in egregiously bad roughing the passer calls, and if Andy Reid made a mistake by not going for it on fourth down in the fourth quarter.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
